content:
I'm getting the following error from the ig publisher:

org.hl7.fhir.exceptions.FHIRException: Unable to resolve package id hl7.terminology.r4#null
        at org.hl7.fhir.utilities.cache.FilesystemPackageCacheManager.fetchTheOldWay(FilesystemPackageCacheManager.java:655)
        at org.hl7.fhir.utilities.cache.FilesystemPackageCacheManager.loadFromPackageServer(FilesystemPackageCacheManager.java:220)
        at org.hl7.fhir.utilities.cache.FilesystemPackageCacheManager.loadPackage(FilesystemPackageCacheManager.java:477)
        at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.loadUTG(Publisher.java:2284)
        at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.initializeFromIg(Publisher.java:1752)
        at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.initialize(Publisher.java:1363)
        at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.execute(Publisher.java:700)
        at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.main(Publisher.java:7811)

Anyone seen this? Know why?
FHIR IG Publisher Version 1.1.4-SNAPSHOT (Git# 23949131ee19). Built 2020-07-22T06:48:28.419Z (9 hours old)
I started getting this error as of 8:00 AM PST not prior. I would be very interested in the resolution.

Version 1.1.4? Please return the time machine to its proper place :wink:

The latest version according to https://github.com/HL7/fhir-ig-publisher/releases is 1.1.3
right, how did you get to be running in advance of the release?
